name: dyeui
description: Dyeui is a Next.js/React UI Styled System with a design theme, built-in styleguide as well as test suite configuration

scripts.pnd: git push origin master && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages

author: Bartek Kus
